i thought riot said, a while ago, that they were trying to reduce snowballing? snowballing is worse than it has ever been. 

like you said, literally every game is heavily 1 sided. games end in 10mins because of 1 person getting so hyper fed. this used to happen sometimes before but not pretty much every match like it does now.

it usually stems from someones error (or several errors) early on rather than being out skilled or outplayed. and people wonder why the game is so toxic. there's the pretty justifiable perception that you get punished by 1 bad person on your team.
